text: Arthur Allemeersch (born 27 July 2001) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays for OH Leuven in the Belgian First Division B. Allemeersch played his first match on 23 August 2019 in a Belgian Cup match against Wetteren, scoring once in a 6–0 win. One week later he was subbed on again in an away win at Lokeren. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Belgian footballers Category:Oud-Heverlee Leuven players Category:Belgian Second Division/Belgian First Division B players
title: Arthur Allemeersch
